import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Formulario = ({ onSubmit }) => { const [name, setName] = useState('JUAN'); const [surname, setSurname] = useState('JUAN'); const [email, setEmail] = useState('JUAN@GMAIL.COM'); const [password, setPassword] = useState('12345678'); const [address, setAddress] = useState('CALLE ESPAÃ‘A'); const [prov, setProv] = useState('SC'); const [date, setDate] = useState(new Date().toString()); const [age, setAge] = useState('18'); const [vehicule, setVehicle] = useState('coche'); const [agree, setAgree] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = (e) => { const user = { name, surname, email, password, address, prov, date, age, vehicule, agree }; e.preventDefault(); // alert(`Formulario enviado ... ${name} ${surname}`) onSubmit(user); }; return (
